name: protein-synthesis-web-app
description: A comprehensive protein synthesis web application with 3D visualization and AI integration

scripts.dev:backend: bash -c 'cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python main.py'
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.setup:manual: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: bash -c 'cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.setup:backend:win: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.db:init: bash -c 'cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python init_db.py'

author: Your Name
